snippet: Republicans in the State Senate moved a “right to work” measure out of committee, and it is expected to pass next week.
abstract: Indiana House Democrats bring state lawmaking to a halt, refusing for a third straight day to come out to their chamber floor in a procedural effort to stop 'right to work' legislation at the center of a mounting battle over unions.
lead_paragraph: Republicans in the State Senate moved a “right to work” measure out of committee, and it is expected to pass next week.

headline.seo: Indiana ‘Right to Work’ Measure Expected to Pass
headline.main: Indiana Labor Measure Is Expected to Progress
headline.print_headline: Indiana Labor Measure Is Expected to Progress
